engine.dijekstra

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.dijekstra.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphInt

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphInt
    Graph contains all of the vertices and manipulates and connects every vertex with all other neighbor vertices through using edges
    Author:
    Peter
